title: To Aru Kagaku No Railgun
alternative_title: A Certain Scientific Railgun, とある科学の超電磁砲
description: The story is set in a world where supernatural powers exist through science, and magic exists through religion. University City. 2.3 million inhabitants. 80% of the students are active in the ‘Brain Development Program’ and out of those only 7 are Level 5s. Meet the civilian protagonist Mikoto and her friend Kuroko, maintainers of peace and order at the University district, as members of the ‘Judgement
